relation: Updated contact list interface (uses Qt 4 rather than Qt 3)
Update Kopete to better support Decibel
Move file transfer request into chat window
Greatly improve experience for LDAP (e.g. MS Active Directory) administrators
Improve per-host settings (remember scaling mode and other options)
